text: Raymond Gaston Joseph Séguy (8 December 1929 - 21 March 2022) was a French Roman Catholic bishop. He became a priest in 1954. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Gap, France from 1981 to 1987 and as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Autun, France, from 1987 until his retirement in 2006.Raymond Gaston Joseph Seguy ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:French Roman Catholic bishops
title: Raymond Séguy
